subTitle: Ask us anything about our brand and products, and get factual responses.

faqs.question: What types of tools are included in the Individual Plan?
faqs.answer: The Individual plan features a license for the Standard Assertive AI CLI Tool, allowing users to generate 100 tests per month on a Class and Method scale, perfect for building personal projects you don't want breaking.

faqs.question: Can I upgrade from the Individual Plan to the Teams Plan?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade to the Teams Plan at any time to access a wider range of high-quality services, enjoy priority customer support, and receive exclusive updates. Contact our team for a seamless transition.

faqs.question: What kind of customer support can I expect?
faqs.answer: All our customers receive dedicated email support. With the Individual plan, you'll receive our standard support, while the Teams and Enterprise plans upgrade you to priority support, meaning faster response times and specialized assistance.
